title: Presidential Alert
alt: When putting his kids to bed, after saying 'Goodnight', Obama has to stop himself from saying 'God bless you, and God bless the United States of America.'
transcript:
[Television beeping.]
Screen reads: "E.A.S Incoming Presidential Alert"[Person in an office is on the television.]
My fellow Americans. I, uhhh. Wow.Frankly, I didn't realize what this button did. I was just... I mean... I appear before you tonight to, um.Look, uhh...
Remember to floss regularly. Oral hygiene is important. Thank you.
